channel.title: about on Marium Tapal

item.title: about
item.description: Hi, I’m Marium Tapal! I study Mathematics & Statistical and Data Sciences at Smith College (a historically women’s college in Massachusetts, USA) with an expected graduation date in May 2022. I am passionate about learning new data science tools and technologies and solving complicated mathematical equations. My primary programming language is R. I am the maintainer of the fec16 R package (hosted on CRAN). I am also a contributor to the fivethirtyeight R package and the ModernDive book and package.
